name: Arrow Battles
description:
Hi, I'm Jester1979 and this is my second game. Throw arrows, kill enemys and buy cute pets! Enjoy the big range of bows and arrows!

Arrow Battles is free to play, but it has some dlcs! You can buy the Deluxe Version to get them all for only 1$. 

Here's a comparison to the normal and the deluxe version!!!

Normal VersionDeluxe versionGame modes3 (easy, normal, hard)6 (easy, normal,hard,gold rush, only pets, fog game)petsOnly 13mobile versionyesyesunlimited gameyesyesEndingnone1 secret edning
